title: A Conversation With Jeff Miller
author: Seeking Alpha

description: Jeff Miller, a prominent Seeking Alpha contributor and also an investment advisor with NewArc Investments, discusses how he goes about gaining clarity about clients’ needs, goals and risk tolerance.
